short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that enables surfing .un sites, a peer-to-peer domain system based on Fantom network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this extension you are able to surf the .un websites that are registered in the blockchain using our website, uncensorabledomains.com
